casebody.data:
Debra DAVIS
v.
John DAVIS. No. 571PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 15, 2005. Theodore M. Molitoris, Winston-Salem, Michelle D. Reingold, for John Davis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of August 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Debra Davis) shall have up to and including the 14th day of September 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of August 2005."
